date: "2022-08-09"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

set.seed(9)
```


```{r csv import}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(hrbrthemes)

df_ga_mr_orginal <- read_csv("wandb_ga_mr_trial1.csv")

str(df_ga_mr_orginal)
```


```{r data cleaning}
df_ga_mr_subset <- df_ga_mr_orginal %>% select(Name, avg_fit, mutation_rate)

#View(df_ga_mr_subset)

```

```{r data analysis}

df_ga_mr_subset %>%
  ggplot(aes(mutation_rate, avg_fit)) +
  geom_line(color="grey") +
  geom_point(shape=21, color="black", fill="#69b3a2", size=6) +
  labs(x = "Mutation Rate", y = "Average Fit in the final population", title = "GA - Mutation Rates Comparison",
       subtitle = "Number of Generations = 10, Population Size = 10, Crossover Rate = 0.7")

```
